channel.title: Removing skill buttons from skill tab
channel.description:
Hi all, is it possible to remove the bottom 3 skill buttons from the skill tab? Currently using Galkons client and it is displaying summoning, hunter & construction, I would like the keep the whole interface but just remove these buttons. Is it possible?
Any help is appreciated!

item.title: Removing skill buttons from skill tab
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

Use this tutorial:

moparisthebest.com

item.source: Removing skill buttons from skill tab

item.title: Removing skill buttons from skill tab
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you need to export the interface cache. edit the interface. repack the interface cache.

you can also just rip it from a client that has the interface you want, or search rune-server because they release interfaces a lot more than over here.

Read full topic
item.source: Removing skill buttons from skill tab

item.title: Removing skill buttons from skill tab
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

I want the actual whole 3 boxes gone, removing the sprites will only remove the 3 logos and leave 3 blank boxes.

What is Tims cache suite all about? What do I use it for?

Read full topic
item.source: Removing skill buttons from skill tab

item.title: Removing skill buttons from skill tab
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

You could try to open your cache with Tom’s cache suite;

MediaFire

Toms Cache Suite - Modified.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

or take a look in your sprites if it’s in there.
Guess you’ll find it with Tom’s cache suite.

Good luck

Read full topic
